entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
